Name: Virtuous Western
About the game: Virtuous Western is a strategy game located in the old west, where our protagonist must eliminate all enemies in the area using a limited amount of bullets, to recover your stolen horse. Interesting and fun puzzles Different ways to beat each stage Beautiful pixel art graphics Different ways to eliminate enemies 30 stages in the main campaign Speedrun mode with stopwatch
